lines.text: Men, we've fought and won. But in winning we have lost something. In defending one law, we've come to despise all law. And if you go on like this, we'll destroy the very thing we fight for.
If you're going to hang, I'll hang with you. That's the least you can let me do.
They're real friendly like, the injuns.
The only friendly Indians are dead Indians, I say.
I won't! I'm not going to be a widow before I'm even a wife.
